# Onboarding Child Tasks (auto-generated)

Tasks created by Copilot for the onboarding epics (two per epic).

- Access & Permissions
  - Issue: Confirm GitHub/GCP access and roles
  - Issue: Add Access Request template

- Local Dev Environment
  - Issue: Add `devcontainer.json` and `docker-compose.dev.yml`
  - Issue: Document local setup and test commands

- Secrets & IAM
  - Issue: Rotate compromised token (owner action)
  - Issue: Migrate CI/runtime secrets to Google Secret Manager (GSM)

- CI/CD & Tests
  - Issue: Verify CI pipelines and add CI checklist
  - Issue: Document test commands and add pytest workflow

- Docs & Readme
  - Issue: Add docs-acknowledgement template and checklist
  - Issue: Update README Quick Start with links to required docs

- Automation Scripts & Baseline Checks
  - Issue: Add `--help` examples and docs for `normalize_issues.py`
  - Issue: Document `ci_monitoring.py` usage and sample runs
